name: clipboard-history-manager
description: Application used to extend clipboard functions

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "cross-env BROWSER=none npm run start:react" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run build:electron && npm run start:electron"
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:react && npm run start:electron:prod
scripts.build: npm run build:electron && npm run build:react && electron-builder --dir --publish=never
scripts.build:electron: cd src && browserify -x electron electron-main.js -o ../public/electron.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] --plugins [ @babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties ] ] --node -d && cd ../
scripts.build:release: npm run build:electron && npm run build:react && cross-env GH_TOKEN="cc9fe892b2d04cf06ec6f2ce72db5db2f1514888" electron-builder --publish=always
